remarks: Triangle inequality for the norm of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvtri.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvtri.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvtri.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvtri $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A G B ) ) <_ ( ( N ` A ) + ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
